author: Maximilian_Wagner
title: EEYORE KEY CHAIN
review:
Because it's only a small keychain, this review won't be as long as a normal one.

For the price of 5.99€, you get a surprising big figure. Remember that it's the same price as for a little minifigure keychain!

I didn't buy it because I liked the TV series in my childhood, but I thought it would look quite funny. That's the reason why I even considered buying the entire Ideas set. My wallet is now happy about the release of this keychain... :-)

It isn't worth to describe it in each detail: You get exactly what you see at the images of LEGO, and in my opinion, it was a good decision to take it home from the LEGO-Store.

And that brings me to my last point: In Germany, you pay as far I know only 4.99€ in the stores but 5.99€ in the online shop, so you can save one Euro if you buy it there! However, I just visited the shops in Nuremberg and Munich, I don't know about the situation in other parts of Germany, Austria, Switzerland and the rest of Europe.

I hope you enjoyed my short review, leave me a ''helpful'' Assessment there if you want and have a nice day!
